action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant on the table, the book in the refrigerator and the mop in the wardrobe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
> open cupboard
Turn 1
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
> go to pantry
Turn 2
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
> open refrigerator
Turn 3
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a apple, a sandwich, a banana, a peach and a orange.
> go to kitchen
Turn 4
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
> go to hallway
Turn 5
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.
> take potted plant
Turn 6
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant.
> go to kitchen
Turn 7
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
> put potted plant on counter
Turn 8
You put the potted plant on the counter.
> go to pantry
Turn 9

You are in a pantry now. There are a peach, a apple, a freezer, a banana, a orange, a sandwich and a refrigerator. The peach is in the refrigerator. The apple is in the refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The banana is in the refrigerator. The orange is in the refrigerator. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The refrigerator is open. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
> go to hallway
Turn 10
You can't go to a hallway from here.

> go to kitchen

 are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard, a plate and a potted plant. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. The potted plant is on the counter. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
> go to hallway
Turn 11

You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a potted plant, a cupboard and a plate. The potted plant is on the counter. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
> take potted plant
Turn 12
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant.

> go to living room

You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a living room here.

You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.
> go to bedroom
Turn 15
You are in a bedroom now. There are a table, a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
> open wardrobe
Turn 16
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there are a pillow and a book.
> take book
Turn 17
You take the book. In your inventory you have a potted plant and a book.
> go to kitchen

> go to hallway

> take mop
